import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; const Prelevement_generateur = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); let token = `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}` ; const [pleingen, setpleingen] = useState([]); let n = 1; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/pleingen`, { headers : { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type' : 'application/json', Authorization : token } } ).then((response) => { setpleingen(response.data.data); setLoading(false); }).catch((error) => { alert(error) }) }, []) return( <>
+ Prelevement

{n++} {e.immatriculation} {e.user} {e.matricule_ch} {e.qteplein} {e.kilometrage}
